itemDescription: British secretary known for her work with The Beatles, president of the official Beatles Fan Club

wikipedia_page.main: Freda Kelly (born 14 July 1945) was the secretary to Brian Epstein and the English rock band the Beatles from 1962 through 1972, and president of the group's official fan club. Kelly worked with the band as it rose from local popularity to world-wide fame, and through its dissolution. A 2013 documentary, Good Ol' Freda, chronicled Kelly's ten-plus year association with the group and its members.

response: * Freda Kelly (born 1944), secretary and manager of The Beatles fan club
